bill_title: Honoring Tea choir students who were selected to Senior Honor Choir.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Tea choir students who were selected to Senior Honor Choir. WHEREAS, the South Dakota High School Honors Choir brings together one hundred fifty auditioned high school students who practice together for a week to prepare a presentation of western art; and WHEREAS, four Tea Area students were selected for the Senior Honor Choir: Brody Wilken, Damien DeVries, Tiffany Young, and Jarret Johnson were deservingly chosen to perform at the honor choir in Sioux Falls at Augustana University: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature shows its congratulations toward these deserving individuals for their excellence and dedication to performing.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Tea choir students who were selected to Senior Honor Choir.
